verses.arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
verses.translation: (1) Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: (2) Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture[1811] that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: (3) Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: (4) Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: (5) Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kāfūr,[1812]

verses.arabic_text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
verses.translation: (6) A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allāh will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

verses.arabic_text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا
verses.translation: (7) They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

verses.arabic_text: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: (8) And they give food in spite of love for it[1813] to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: (9) [Saying], "We feed you only for the face [i.e., approval] of Allāh. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: (10) Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

verses.arabic_text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
verses.translation: (11) So Allāh will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

verses.arabic_text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُواْ جَنَّةٗ وَحَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: (12) And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

verses.arabic_text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: (13) [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.

verses.arabic_text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا
verses.translation: (14) And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

verses.arabic_text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.translation: (15) And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

verses.arabic_text: قَوَارِيرَاْ مِن فِضَّةٖ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِيرٗا
verses.translation: (16) Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

verses.arabic_text: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: (17) And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

verses.arabic_text: عَيۡنٗا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِيلٗا
verses.translation: (18) [From] a fountain within it [i.e., Paradise] named Salsabeel.

verses.arabic_text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا
verses.translation: (19) There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

verses.arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: (20) And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

verses.arabic_text: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: (21) Upon them [i.e., the inhabitants] will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
verses.translation: (22) [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا
verses.translation: (23) Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muḥammad], the Qur’ān progressively.

verses.arabic_text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا
verses.translation: (24) So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

verses.arabic_text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا
verses.translation: (25) And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

verses.arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: (26) And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt [i.e., praise] Him a long [part of the] night.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
verses.translation: (27) Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them[1814] a grave Day.

verses.arabic_text: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا
verses.translation: (28) We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
verses.translation: (29) Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

verses.arabic_text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
verses.translation: (30) And you do not will except that Allāh wills. Indeed, Allāh is ever Knowing and Wise.

verses.arabic_text: يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا
verses.translation: (31) He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
